backend/main.mo: Main canister implementing products, orders, users, auth, roles, merchant config, and storage with access control mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text mapping of frontend file paths to short functional descriptions for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH theme tokens for light and dark modes with global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application router configuring all public, account, and admin routes wrapped in AppShell.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGuard: Wrapper component checking admin status and showing loading or access-denied UI before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/EmailCodeSi: Implements a multi-step email, code, and user-details sign‑in flow with validation and simulated loading. Manages state transitions, error handling, and session setup placeholders.
frontend/src/components/auth/InAppBrowse: Detects in-app browsers and blocks sign-in, offering options to open externally or copy the link. Displays warnings and instructions for secure authentication.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Shows a login/logout button that either navigates to login or clears sessions and signs out. Uses auth session state to toggle behavior and UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps protected content, allowing access if signed in or in guest mode, otherwise showing sign-in or guest options. Handles loading and displays guest notices.
frontend/src/components/checkout/UpiPaym: Displays a UPI payment UI with QR code, deep‑link handling, config overrides, and copy‑to‑clipboard actions. Shows fallback notices when merchant config is missing.
frontend/src/components/home/BannerCarou: Auto-advancing looping carousel showing simple gradient banners. Uses a ref to trigger timed slide transitions.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeSearchB: Provides a debounced search bar with popover results for products and categories. Allows selecting results to navigate to product or filtered catalog pages.
Defines the main app layout with header, footer, routed content, and bottom nav, showing guest warnings and triggering profile setup when needed.
frontend/src/components/layout/BrandHead: Responsive header with logo, search, cart count, account access, and mobile menu using sheet UI.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileBot: Bottom navigation bar for mobile with links to catalog, cart, and account, highlighting the active route.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductC: Displays product image, details, rating, and provides add‑to‑cart and wishlist actions with auth checks.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductS: Horizontally scrollable section rendering a titled list of ProductCard components.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal form for creating a user profile with name, email, and phone, submitting via a saveProfile mutation.
frontend/src/constants/auth.ts: Defines minimum password and username lengths for client-side validation.
frontend/src/constants/upi.ts: Provides UPI merchant constants and utilities to build UPI deep links and retrieve QR code paths.
Documentation describing the admin activation process, error handling, and related backend behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, auto‑invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminActivation.ts: Mutation hook validating a 4‑digit activation code and invoking backend admin bootstrap with query refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthSession.ts: Combines session auth, guest mode, and Internet Identity to compute signed‑in state and user role.
frontend/src/hooks/useBootstrapAdmin.ts: Simple wrapper re-exporting useAdminActivation for consistent admin activation flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerPrincipal.ts: Queries the backend for the caller’s Principal when an actor and identity are available.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerUserProfileS: Safely fetches the signed‑in user’s profile only when authentication indicates a non‑guest user.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserRole.ts: Retrieves the caller’s role from the backend and provides helper flags for guest, user, and admin.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, identity loading, and status handling via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating products, categories, cart data, ratings, and more using the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/styles plus CSS variables for theming in light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/account/AccountLoginP: Provides email code sign‑in and an option to continue as guest, blocking in‑app browsers when detected.
frontend/src/pages/account/AccountPage.t: Manages account state with options to sign in, sign out, continue as guest, and access profile or orders.
frontend/src/pages/account/AccountSignup: Handles username/password account creation with validation, hashing simulation, and redirect on success.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminActivatePa: Brief activation page that auto‑redirects users to the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAnalyticsP: Displays sales, orders, product stats, and recent order summaries for admins.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCustomersP: Shows an admin-only informational page about customer data stored and managed on‑chain.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Renders the admin dashboard with navigation cards for products, orders, customers, analytics, support, and UPI settings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays a filterable orders table with status update controls and loading states for admins.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Provides product and category management, including dialogs to add new products with images and new categories.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSupportTic: Shows a placeholder alert explaining the demo support ticket system implementation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminUpiConfigP: Allows admins to view and update UPI merchant configuration with form validation and backend persistence.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays and manages the user’s shopping cart with item removal, clearing, totals, and checkout navigation.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Product catalog with searching, filtering, sorting, category selection, and responsive filter UI.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements a multi-step checkout flow handling address, payment, and order placement using cart and profile data.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with hero banner, search, categories, and featured product sections populated via product queries.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Shows an authenticated notifications page with an empty-state message and placeholder card.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays detailed order info with tracking steps and invoice download support.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Lists user orders sorted by date with navigation to individual order details and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows product details, image, cart/wishlist actions, and rating submission with auth checks.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays and edits the authenticated user's profile using form fields and save mutations.
frontend/src/pages/support/FaqPage.tsx: Displays a list of FAQs with accordion UI and a link to create support tickets.
frontend/src/pages/support/SupportTicket: Shows basic details for a selected support ticket with authenticated access.
Implements local support ticket creation and listing with a modal form and navigation to ticket details.
frontend/src/pages/WishlistPage.tsx: Shows the user's wishlist by mapping stored product IDs to product data and rendering product cards.
frontend/src/utils/copyToClipboard.ts: Provides clipboard copy using the modern API with a textarea fallback, returning success as a boolean.
frontend/src/utils/detectInAppBrowser.ts: Detects common in‑app browsers from the user agent and returns a readable browser name.
frontend/src/utils/extractBackendErrorMe: Extracts meaningful error messages from various backend error shapes, including nested or stringified structures.
frontend/src/utils/guestSession.ts: Manages guest mode state in sessionStorage with methods to check, enable, and clear the flag.
frontend/src/utils/openExternalBrowser.t: Attempts to open the current URL in a new tab/window to trigger external browser handling, returning success as a boolean.
frontend/src/utils/simpleAuthSession.ts: Stores and retrieves simple session‑based auth method and identifiers, with helpers for sign‑in status and clearing state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL and hash parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, including requirements for an email sign‑in flow with simulated verification and profile data collection.
